diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+#pragma once
+
+#include <ATen/core/SmallVector.h>
+#include <stdint.h>
+
+namespace at {
+
+/// A container for sizes or strides
+using DimVector = SmallVector<int64_t, 5>;
body:
Wondering idly: maybe the max here should be 4 rather than 5, based on the fact that Caffe2 historically defined

```
  SetDims(const TIndex d0, const TIndex d1, const TIndex d2, const TIndex d3) {
```

but not the 5-ary version.
